messageUs: Please write to us. We love reading your letters!
feedbackEmailLaunchError: Error starting the mail program. Check the correctness of its settings

trackingDialogText:
The Apple company requires us to ask for your permission to use a unique advertising identifier. However, our application does not show you ads. Therefore, your answer, whatever it is, will not affect the performance of the application.

Sincerely,

The staff
contactAppNotFound: This application is absent on the phone
customerInfo: By order of the Television radio broadcasting organization of the Union State "TRBO of the Union"
